p: The 65–74 and ≥75 years age groups were associated with an increased risk of death (aOR 1.69, 95% CI: 1.09–2.62 and 1.78, 95% CI: 1.20–2.65, respectively). Immune deficiency, chronic cardiovascular disease and chronic liver disease were also associated with an increased risk of death. Antiviral treatment was associated with a lower risk of death ( Fig 2 and S2 Table).
